    1: from pandas import (
    2:     TimedeltaIndex,
    3:     timedelta_range,
    4: )
    5: import pandas._testing as tm
    6: 
    7: 
    8: class TestTimedeltaIndexOps:
    9:     def test_infer_freq(self, freq_sample):
   10:         # GH#11018
   11:         idx = timedelta_range("1", freq=freq_sample, periods=10)
   12:         result = TimedeltaIndex(idx.asi8, freq="infer")
   13:         tm.assert_index_equal(idx, result)
   14:         assert result.freq == freq_sample
